name: Monster Tooth Doctor Games
description:
Time to become the Monster Tooth Doctor in the super cool dentist salon! Don’t be scared. Check the patients and clean their teeth!

This could be your favorite game. Monster needs your help to teeth treatment. Select your favorite character to become the most experienced Monster Tooth Doctor. Teach the children how about to care the teeth to be healthy! A new FUN learning environment.

You will treat cute monster with the help of a brush, cotton pliers, mouth mirror and polishing paste to make them healthy and happy again.

Features:
- Many tooth tools to care for the patients!
- Take care of patients in Monster Tooth Doctor game
- Cool Graphics and Sounds effect
- Keep your progress up-to-date with an amazing feature.
- Tighten the Braces to straighten up teeth
- Never ending tooth treatment scenarios to complete!
- Have fun!
